action.text: SA 3946 fell when when SA 3945 fell.
Motion to table amendment SA 3946 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 613.
Amendment SA 3946 proposed by Senator Thune to Amendment SA 3945 (the instructions of the motion to commit). To improve the bill.
